</image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;d3e6274d.1409">   <title>Higher Education Academy Enhancement events - 2014/15 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;d3e6274d.1409</link>   <description> Committed to learning and teaching? Join us at our UK-wide series of enhancement events this year<br><br>Second event 13 October 2014 - Inspiring connections: preparing students to contribute to a globally connected society<br>Internationalisation remains a core focus for UK HE, and is the theme for our second learning and teaching enhancement event, which takes place on Monday 13 October at Sheraton Grand Hotel, Edinburgh.<br>Our keynote speaker, Robin Middlehurst, Professor of Higher Education at Kingston University, will address core issues around internationalisation, including how HE can provide and promote a high quality learning experience for all students studying UK [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-19T10:10:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Rajesh Dhimar</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;d3e6274d.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;96fa4f7e.1409">   <title>HETL - PsTL Conference Call for Proposals </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;96fa4f7e.1409</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues:<br><br>The International Higher Education Teaching and Learning Association<br>&lt;https://www.hetl.org/&gt; (HETL) and the Department of Postsecondary Teaching<br>and Learning &lt;http://www.cehd.umn.edu/PsTL/&gt; at the University of Minnesota<br>invite you to attend the 2015 International HETL \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd PsTL Conference, to be<br>held in *Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA, from September 22nd - 24th, 2015*.<br>HETL and PsTL invite you to submit your conference presentation proposal at<br>https://www.hetl.org/2015-hetl-pstl-conference-submission-form/. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-16T17:14:31-04:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Patrick Blessinger</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;96fa4f7e.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;7aa45609.1407">   <title>Rideout Conference & Workshop - Final Reminder </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;7aa45609.1407</link>   <description> Later this month, Rideout are hosting two special events.<br><br>1. Where Does Talent Come From? - A one-day conference on 23 July 2014 at the Hyatt Regency in Birmingham UK exploring the origins of talent and strategies for nurturing its development. Speakers include Germaine Greer and BBC Radio 4's Tim Harford along with other experts from psychology, the arts and criminal justice. Discount rates maybe available upon request. Full details here http://bit.ly/1hbPCyF [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-09T15:51:30+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Saul Hewish</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;7aa45609.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;cb7e3479.1406">   <title>New HEA research Conditions of flexibility: securing a more responsive higher education system published </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;cb7e3479.1406</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;cb7e3479.1406">New HEA research Conditions of flexibility: securing a more responsive higher education system published </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-06-11T13:54:23+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Flexible.Learning@heacademy.ac.uk</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;cb7e3479.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;c86a25bd.1406">   <title>REMINDER: Leicester PBL Summer Workshop 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;c86a25bd.1406</link>   <description> Dear Colleague<br><br>You are invited to the 12th LeAP summer workshop on problem based learning (PBL) which will take place in Leicester 7-9 July 2014. Please find further details in the attached flyer and on the web site http://www.physics.le.ac.uk/PBLSummerSchool/ Please pass this invitation on to anyone you know who might be interested. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-10T16:21:51+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>PBLWorkshop</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;c86a25bd.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;f58a12ea.1405">   <title>Leicester PBL Summer Workshop 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;f58a12ea.1405</link>   <description> Dear Colleague<br><br>You are invited to the 12th LeAP summer workshop on problem based learning (PBL) which will take place in Leicester 7-9 July 2014. Please find further details in the attached flyer and on the web site http://www.physics.le.ac.uk/PBLSummerSchool/ Please pass this invitation on to anyone you know who might be interested. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-22T10:31:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>PBLWorkshop</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;f58a12ea.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;b5979dde.1405">   <title>Conference Event Announcement: Where Does Talent Come From? </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;b5979dde.1405</link>   <description> List subscribers maybe interested in this forthcoming conference.<br><br>Apologies for any cross posting.<br><br>Where Does Talent Come From<br>&amp; how do you nurture it?<br><br>23 July 2014<br><br>A one-day conference event presented<br>at the Hyatt Regency Hotel, Birmingham, UK<br><br>With Speakers:\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br><br>Germaine Greer, Academic, Author and Journalist\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>Tim Harford, Economist and Author\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>Adrian Furnham, Professor of Psychology University of London\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>John Bergman, founder of Geese Theatre Company (USA)<br>Daniella Genas, Director Aspire4U\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd<br>Laura Caulfield, School of Society, Enterprise and Environment, Bath Spa University [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-06T16:43:57+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Saul Hewish</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;b5979dde.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;7f72e5b4.1404">   <title>Changing the Learning Landscape - Schedule of Workshops </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;7f72e5b4.1404</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;7f72e5b4.1404">Changing the Learning Landscape - Schedule of Workshops </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-04-28T10:19:23+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>subscribe (ALT-annouce) CLL</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;7f72e5b4.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;5ba4bab8.1404">   <title>BYOD FE Survey </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;5ba4bab8.1404</link>   <description> Bring Your Own Device in FE Colleges: student survey<br>My name is Graham Fidler and I am a student at The Manchester College and I wondered if you had a few minutes to answer a short survey for me?<br><br>I am collecting information which will be used as primary research in my dissertation entitled 'The challenges of implementing a Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) scheme in Further Education colleges' as part of my BSc (Hons) Business Computing with IT degree (University of Salford). [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-04T18:51:18+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Graham Fidler</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;5ba4bab8.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;b8af8bb4.1404">   <title>BYOD Survey request </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;b8af8bb4.1404</link>   <description> My name is Graham Fidler and I am a mature student at The Manchester College.<br>I am trying to collect information which will be used as primary research in my dissertation entitled \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdThe challenges of implementing a Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) scheme in Further Education colleges\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd as part of my BSc (Hons) Business Computing with IT degree (University of Salford).<br>The aim of my research is to gather information from colleges and it is intended that the analysis of data and subsequent report will highlight these challenges and show whether they may actually outweigh any benefits. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-03T19:35:55+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Graham Fidler</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;b8af8bb4.1404</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;a9a1f13d.1404">   <title>Changing the Learning Landscape (CLL) - Schedule of Workshops </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;a9a1f13d.1404</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;a9a1f13d.1404">Changing the Learning Landscape (CLL) - Schedule of Workshops </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-04-03T11:40:49+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>cll@heacademy.ac.uk</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HEA-IED;a9a1f13d.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
